org.restlet.connector
Interface Client

All Superinterfaces:
Connector, Element, UniformInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalClient
public interface Client
extends Connector, UniformInterface

Connector that initiates communication by making a request.

"The primary connector types are client and server. The essential difference between the two is that a client initiates communication by making a request, whereas a server listens for connections and responds to requests in order to supply access to its services. A component may include both client and server connectors." Roy T. Fielding

See Also:
Source dissertation
